long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gleef allows companies to write more effective words online.
Create, preview, launch and monitor your experiments with the Gleef extension, and push them directly to your users. 

More info at 
https://docs.gleef.eu

- TEST CREATION -
Experiment in less than 10 clicks! Select the item you want to test directly on your website, type the variations, choose the success event and choose to publish now, or later. The live preview allows you to avoid any surprise in production.

- ANALYTICS -
The embedded Gleef dashboard allows you to monitor the performance of all your experiment variations, and the experiments significance is computed automatically as soon as you start testing. All past and running experiments stays accessible from the Gleef dashboard.

- WHERE TO START? -
If you're not a Gleef client yet, reach out at team@gleef.eu!

- ABOUT GLEEF -
We're an Antler-backed startup in Paris, France. Feel free to reach out at team@gleef.eu.

Some companies gained up to 150% conversion using Gleef. Start optimizing you copy today!
